title: Yamato 2520
synopsis: Set hundreds of years after the original, Yamato 2520 chronicles the adventures of the eighteenth starship to bear the name, and its battle against the Seiren Federation.
voices: ['Ibu, Masatou', 'Ichiryuusai, Harumi', 'Matsumoto, Yasunori', 'Nagai, Ichiro', 'Kamiya, Akira', 'Mitsuishi, Kotono', 'Sakurai, Tomo']
staff: [['Kageyama, Shigenori', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Shirato, Takeshi', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Maeda, Mahiro', ['Storyboard', ' Animation Director', ' Layout']], ['Takeda, Yuusuke', ['Art Director']]]
